articles.content: Apple made waves when it announced the beautifully massive, feature-packed Apple Watch Ultra on Wednesday, and many of our fellow tech sites gave into the hype. The Verge (opens in new tab) claims th… [+8306 chars]

articles.title: With the iPhone 14, Apple is splitting its user base in half - Android Authority
articles.description: The just-launched iPhone 14 series represents a big shift for Apple. Now, the company has two very distinct types of users in mind.
articles.content: On Wednesday, Apple launched the iPhone 14 series. As with the past three years, the lineup is split, with two semi-affordable entries and two more expensive flagships. In this case, we have the iPho… [+7703 chars]
